product_name: Swix HF7BW High-Fluoro Glide Wax - 18 to 28 Degrees F - 40g
long_description: Ideal for normal winter conditions below freezing, this easy-application wax with lubricant excels on alpine slopes, cross-country trails and old or artificial snow conditions from 18 to 28F.
short_description: Ideal for normal winter conditions below freezing, this easy-application wax with lubricant excels on alpine slopes, cross-country trails and old or artificial snow conditions from 18 to 28F.
